text: System was well adjusted and drinks are cheap. But one thing the owner also like to sing ownself, so took up three songs on her own while we waited for total 6 songs. 2 person 1 table only entitled to 1 song regardless of spending. Thus 4 stars otherwise would be 5 stars

Oldies KTV Pub was a great experience! The atmosphere was fun and laidback, the staff was friendly and accommodating, and I love the selection of drinks & finger food. You may check it out to find out more. The space was perfect for a large/small group gathering and plenty of tables and seating. A great night out for anyone looking for a fun time to have the feel of family bonds. Highly recommend! ðŸ˜˜
The best place in North for a place to chill and sing. One of the best sound system for Karaoke.

My first and only ktv pub which I have been coming for the past 6 years....
Great ktv system and all fun people around...

A quaint and full of fun loving people pub. Very good sound system and many 'professional' pool players!!
Convenient location with ample parking lots.
